@mhp_guy Chris this actually speaks to my experience with trying to sell AI front desk agents. After 40 hours of tinkering and crafting and 100 cold calls and texts, almost nobody is interested.offered  150 a month for call receptionist and after hours help. Not full stack with scheduling

@chatgpt21 Next thing you know, there will be an AI receptionist at the front desk lol.

RT @EchoDoesRadio: I’m so sick of AI!! I can’t even talk to a person during regular business hours because the AI receptionist keeps direct…
